about_the_game:
On your daily "commute" from work, you may sometimes encounter some situations.
Please observe your surroundings carefully and get home safely!

Do not overlook any anomalies.
If you find any anomalies, turn back immediately.
If you don't find any anomalies, do not turn back.

Commute is a short walking simulator inspired by The Exit 8.
The difference is that the pedestrian is a girl, and the progress of the game will be presented by the color of the sky(Sunset → Evening (clear to cloudy) → Late Evening (cloudy to clear)), and you still need to make the right choice to pass the level when you finally arrive home.

Play Time

20-60 minutes.

Settings

Game quality, resolution, camera shake, camera sensitivity and others can be adjusted in the settings.

About Uploading Gameplay Videos

Everyone can upload without permission.
You can only profit from using the features provided by the video platform.
I appreciate it if you mention the name of the game in the title of your gameplay video or live stream, or if you mention a link to the Steam page in the video's description section.

I am not responsible for any damage caused by uploading game videos.
These conditions are subject to change without notice.

highlighted.name: Know Your Enemy And Know Yourself

name: Commute

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD Ryzen™ 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 950 or AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Ryzen™ 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: On your daily "commute" from work, you may sometimes encounter some situations. Please observe your surroundings carefully and get home safely!
